attributes.additional_details:
We are all being nailed by taxes to pay for the stupidity of the previous, and the current, government as well as the banks that WE got out of a hole with our hard-earned cash.

The richest 1% in this country are able to sit back, hire tax accountants and pay next to no tax. It's time to stop this once and for all.

More would be done if the main political parties weren't in the pockets of these parasites or, in fact, one of them..Mr. Osborne.
